Sections.Name: GraphicsSettings
Sections.Description: Related To Graphical Settings For Mod Assets

Keys.Name: ChestCollisionToggle
Keys.Description: If 3D Chests Should Collide With & Block Player Movement || Default = True

Keys.Name: ChestShadowsToggle
Keys.Description: If 3D Chests Should Cast Shadows || Default = True

Sections.Name: ErrorLoggingAndCompatibilitySettings
Sections.Description: Related To Error Logging And Automatic Mod Compatibility Messages

Keys.Name: AllowModCompatWarnings
Keys.Description: If Mod Should Give Warning Messages About Detected Incompatibility Issues || Default = True

Keys.Name: AllowVerboseErrorLogging
Keys.Description: If Mod Should Print Full & Verbose Error Logs For Debugging || Default = True

Keys.Name: DoNotSpamExceptionsLogs
Keys.Description: Only Log Mod Exceptions Once Per Session, To Not Fill Log File || Default = True
